comments.body: We may want to move the alias for `ContractInst` to the lib where these types are being defined.
We discussed this elsewhere. The maintainers of LF feel that using the alias is a choice and they don't encourage it or discourage it, so it should be declared as and when it's needed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +17,21 @@final case class DivulgedContract(
    contractId: Value.ContractId,
    contractInst: Value.ContractInst[Value.VersionedValue[Value.ContractId]],
)
